description:
Associates a floating IP to a port. This is useful for situations
where you have a pre-allocated floating IP or are unable to use the
`flexibleengine_networking_floatingip_v2` resource to create a floating IP.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

FloatingIp.description: IP Address of an existing floating IP.

PortId.description:
ID of an existing port with at least one IP address to
associate with this floating IP.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.
A Networking client is needed to create a floating IP that can be used with
another networking resource, such as a load balancer. If omitted, the
`region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
floating IP (which may or may not have a different address).
